title: Cyber security risk
extract: Cyber risk is any risk associated with financial loss, disruption to operations or damage to an organisation's reputation from a negative event impacting the organisation's information and/or information systems. Examples include cybercrime, data breaches and system outages to name a few.
extract_html: Cyber risk is any risk associated with financial loss, disruption to operations or damage to an organisation's reputation from a negative event impacting the organisation's information and/or information systems. Examples include cybercrime, data breaches and system outages to name a few.
